https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/XqoN8kM8s2KXc0iyFQqafo0ZMZ.jpg Born to rich parents, Majeed falls in love with his not-so-affluent neighbor Suhra. After her father's death, when Suhra struggles to make both ends meet, Majeed pleads with his father to sponsor her education. Refused, he wanders off to distant lands. Balyakalasakhi
